CustomField.description: This field is populated via Trigger_Listing, which finds the Residence and then populates this value from the same Lease that appears in the Most Recent Lease field. This happens on insert of a Listing. This value is not overwritten if later a different Most Recent Lease is entered on Residence. See D-00012773.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This value is pulled from the Most Recent Lease that was populated on Residence at the time the Listing was created. This value is not ever overwritten.
CustomField.label: Previous Lease Rent
